author: Special Correspondent
text:
A 40-year-old woman fell from the terrace of the Capitol Hotel on Raj Bhavan Road on Thursday morning. The deceased, Suzania Shantakumari, was from Mysuru but had been living in Frazer Town, Bengaluru.

She had separated from her husband five years ago, and was unemployed, said the police. Investigations revealed that Ms. Shantakumari checked into Capitol Hotel on March 6. According to witnesses, there was nothing in her demeanour to raise an alarm. On Thursday, she went to the terrace of the hotel. Soon after, guards and the staff heard a loud sound and discovered her body.
title: Woman falls from hotel terrace, dies
